content:
/>
III.ii.2.B.1.k
.
Requesting STRs From NPRC
NPRC houses STRs of Veterans whose service ended prior to the dates shown in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.4.d
.
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.4.h
contains instructions for requesting STRs from the NPRC.
Claims processors must compare the records currently uploaded in VBMS with previous PIES requests prior to taking the actions directed in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.4.h
, to avoid submitting an unnecessary request for records that have already been obtained.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Procedures for Obtaining Service Treatment Records (STRs)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
